# LeafProperty.ProcessorInfoAndFeatures.Features.SEP property

Gets a value representing the key to retrieve the property value.

SYSENTER and SYSEXIT Instructions. The SYSENTER and SYSEXIT and associated MSRs are supported.

Key Composition

* Leaf: ProcessorInfoAndFeatures
* Property: SEP
* Unit: None

Return Value

Type: Boolean
